kind: Pod
spec:
  containers:
  - name: app
    securityContext:
      privileged: true # Comment 663
label: Misconfigured

text:
FROM ubuntu
ENV PASSWORD=root
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install sudo
label: HighRisk

text:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
spec:
  hostNetwork: true
  containers:
  - name: root
    env:
    - name: SECRET
      value: "123456"
    securityContext:
      privileged: true # Comment 560
label: HighRisk
